column5: I haven't posted here in some time so I think I'm due. It's been a different summer for me being away from Ontario. Back to my roots! Enjoy the fish porn. Just one more week till moose season. No place like the rock! P
Nice pics!!,that's a top 5 vacation spot for me .Beautiful!
Wow! That brookie is huge. Agreed with Davey, it's a vacation destination for me as well.
Awesome shots.  First two fish are cod?

Yes those are codfish. There were some big fish caught here. They have what's called a food fishery here. It was open for three weeks and is now closed. Its open again for a week at the end of September. Normally the fish are even bigger at that time of year.

Yes 'bye! Good fish for sure! NICE trout!!  We had a hard time getting big cod like that for the first week I was down, but the second week we hammered them! Lots of fun on a med spinning set up, with 20lb braid  Your living the life my friend! I had a real hard time leaving!! Find me a job, and I will be back in a heartbeat!! Next time your up on the main land, get in touch! Always an open seat for ya buddy!!  S.
Nice. I'd love to have some fresh cod.
Yes bye X2  Nice fish. Love the last shot.Where be that?   WHAT   :w00t:  Say it aint so Pulling that man line by hand over the boats edge,is the only way.
i'm off to The Rock a week from today. Can't wait!!!!!!!!!!
Yep,I,m all packed Simon. What time are we leaving

I did plenty of that too Brian, no worries. It was more fun on the rod though, and I was getting bigger fish too  I was down there for two weeks, when the food fishery opened. Fished every day but two. I brought home about 70lbs of fresh cod fillets  :) Everything I ate while I was there came from the land or sea as well. No store bought meat the whole trip!!  S.
Well it doesn't get any better than that does it!!!
NOPE! I had a real hard time leaving! I was planning on visiting pokerdemon, but there just isn't enough time in a life to do it all!!  S.

This is on the northern peninsula. Out of Canada Bay. I was fishing this morning with nothing to show. I'm am packing away the trout and salmon gear and gettin my shotgun ready for other table fare. Hopefully we can bag a moose next weekend as well. Too bad we couldn't hook up Sinker! When I get back you will have to show me how to shoot those duckies of yours!
I have an open seat for ya anytime bud!!  S.
Hows that fly rod workin, hoping its serving you well der lad

That rod is a gem! It has a little stiffer action than most fly rods which makes it a great caster. It's a tough rod too, I wasn't babying it. Great for fighting strong fish. It should work great on steelhead too. Thanks for the deal on it! I appreciate it.
